entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Harrow AAFC 5:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 late this evening then light before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
